title: (x) Abercrombie & Fitch logo - Adobe Garamond {Eric Buckley}
content:
It's nothing too crazy, but I like the clean look of the Abercrombie & Fitch logo and would like that same font for a project I'm working on.

Thanks!
author: jbaraga

comments.content:
Looks like good ol' [Adobe Garamond Pro Semi-bold.](http://web.archive.org/web/20141109082849/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/F/GARP/F_GARP-10010000.html)

Here's a pic for comparison purposes.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141109082849im_/http:/typophile.com/files/af_6179.jpg)
